title: Blighted

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the end of night, your infection gets worse, progressing a stage. Start at 1 infection.
- If you are healed, regress a stage.

fields.name: Infection Stages:
fields.value:
1: Your rash begins to spread. Tonight, choose to visit someone, giving them Infection stage 1 and your relevant attributes. (You can also choose to not visit.)
2: Your condition grows worse. Each night, you may roleblock a player, and attack another. (If a town player has this infection stage, they can’t attack anyone with it.)
3: The town gives you special consideration due to your pain. You have 2x votes during the day.
4: You sneak out at night to try and seek medicine. Tonight, you can control and learn the role of a player.
5+: You die (Unstoppable).

fields.name: Destiny:
fields.value: Live to the end of the game.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have each living Peasant fulfill their Destiny.
